message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $140. It's in great condition and worth a lot more than that, but I'm willing to make you a good deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  I'm willing to come down to $135, but that's really my bottom line. This product is high quality and I know you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130. Can you consider that?
